thread.title: TV | The Big Bang Theory
thread.title_full: TV | The Big Bang Theory - entertainment.ie

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | The Big Bang Theory
text: Nobody could have predicted how popular a TV show about a load of geeks sitting in an apartment could have become, but whatever reason there is behind it, The Big Bang Theory has undoubtedly become one of the most successful sitcoms of all time. And now at last it's time for the wedding that fans have been waiting for since the pilot episode as the 'will they/won't they' couple that are Leonard and Penny finally tie the knot. Or will they? The opening episode of the ninth season will see the pair head to Las Vegas to get hitched but Penny struggles with Leonard's confession that he kissed another woman while away, will she be able to forgive him?
